dmca_clarifications: My app is removed from Google Play due to trademark  
infringement. (notified by NBA Properties, Inc)
Now I have removed all the uses of NBA's intellectual property and NBA  
Properties, Inc approved my app to be republished.
NBA is asking me How do NBA contact Google to request the republishing of  
the app?
Below is the last email NBA sent to me.



Joseph,

The delay in our response has been due to the NBA's offices being closed  
due to Hurricane Sandy.

In response to your request that the NBA approve the republishing of your  
app, the NBA is willing to make a one-time exception and allow the  
previously infringing app to be republished, but only if you agree in  
writing not to infringe the NBA's intellectual property in the future. This  
agreement covers not only the previously infringing app, but also any  
future apps.

If you agree to these conditions, please respond so in writing and provide  
us the contact information at Google to request the republishing of the app.


Regards,
NBA Enforcement
